name: Crazy Car Rider: Fast Racing
description:
Crazy Car Rider: Fast Racing is stared real car racing stunts on impossible track will drive you crazier and enjoy the real impossible car racing on the endless extreme impossible tracks in the sky highs. You have to complete each impossible car racing mission in order to unlock the next one. Use the different camera views to avoid the crashes and fall downs from the top of the car racing tracks stunt.
• Amazing HD Graphics and realistic views
• Sharp & narrow impossible stunt tracks to ride
• Real stunt car of fast speed driving on impossible tracks
• Endless fun and enjoyment for free
• Smooth controls and easy gameplay
• Best sports cars collection
